name: Strangers (desawa)
description:
This is a Chat Simulating game exploring the theme of online harassment. 

 In this game, you will take on the role of a young woman navigating the internet world. As the game progresses, you come across a chat program that allows you to talk to strangers online.

If you have more interest in this project, please visit the website

 Trigger warning: Please be aware that some content in this game may be triggering for some players.
